summary: Full backend + frontend testing of NightCafe Studio Data Bridge iteration 2. All 11 backend tests pass (100%). Frontend fully working with all new fields and UI components.

ui_bugs.issue: 'Verwijder' button partially covered by Emergent badge in preview environment - environment-specific, not a production bug

integration_issues.issue: Console 404s for placeholder imageUrls in seed data - handled gracefully by onError handler

critical_code_review_comments: @app.on_event('shutdown') is deprecated in FastAPI - use lifespan context manager instead (minor, non-blocking)
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during test run. Existing seed data preserved.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working: health endpoint, stats summary (5 stats: total/withImage/withPrompt/withMultipleImages/published), POST import with all new fields (revisedPrompt, allImages, initialResolution, aspectRatio, seed, isPublished), duplicate detection by creationId, detail panel shows all fields + thumbnail strip + published badge + tags. Extension manifest.json is valid MV3 with correct host_permissions. content.js has no syntax errors. Route ordering is correct (stats/summary before parameterized route). REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL env var not available in backend test env - fixed by reading from frontend/.env file.
verified_features: POST /api/import accepts all new fields: revisedPrompt, allImages, initialResolution, aspectRatio, seed, isPublished
Stats bar shows 5 stats: Totaal, Met afbeelding, Met prompt, Meerdere afb., Gepubliceerd
Detail panel shows: Text Prompt, Model, Initial Resolution, Aspect Ratio, Seed, Sampling Method, Published badge, Tags
Thumbnail strip shows with 2 thumbnails for multi-image imports
Extension manifest.json: valid MV3 with host_permissions for localhost
